adjective.description: (of a book or greeting card) containing folded cut-out pictures that rise up to form a three-dimensional scene or figure when the page is turned.
Denoting a store or other business that opens quickly in a temporary location and is intended to operate for only a short period of time.
examples: fashion brands have been especially keen on pop-up stores in recent months

noun.description: A pop-up picture in a book.
A pop-up menu or other utility.
